name: Sun Gold Tomato Caprese with Burrata
description: Grab the recipe for this incredible Sun Gold Tomato Caprese with Burrata and toasty breadcrumbs! It's the perfect summer nosh.
ingredients: ▢ freshly cracked black pepper to taste
instructions: On a platter arrange the balls of burrata torn open with the sun gold tomatoes and top with the additional ingredients. Serve alongside crostini. For the Breadcrumbs Place a large non-stick skillet over medium heat with the olive oil and butter. Add the panko and sauté for 3-5 minutes until it starts to turn golden brown about 30 seconds before it's done, add the garlic. Remove from heat and transfer to a paper towel lined plate to drain any excess oil. Use as needed
